definition[0]: someone who has official permission to do something
definition[1]: someone who has official permission to do something, especially to sell alcohol
example[0]: The full licence enables the licensee to sell liquor for consumption either on or off the premises.
definition[2]: an organization that has permission to make or sell something to which another organization holds the PATENT (=the legal right to make or sell a new product)
example[1]: licensees who have been permitted to develop, manufacture and market the patented article or process
